title: Brand New House For Sale In Walpola - Kandana
details:
* Highly residential area.
* Situated in Walpola, kandana.
* Close to Walpola railway station.
* 10 Minutes drive to Ragama town
* 10 minutes drive to Negambo - Colombo main road.
* 5 minutes to De Mezenod College.
* Walking distance to Thewatta churth.
* 02 storied house.
* 04 Bed rooms.
* 02 Bathrooms.
* Servant toilet / Shower available.
* Outside kitchen available.
* House Owner is living overseas (Can reach on What's up – 00971553727818 - Anupama )
* Can visit anytime. pls call before come.
